Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.
Summary
DescriptionFlag of Sardinia, Italy.svg
English: Flag of the Italian autonomous region Sardinia.
Italiano: Bandiera della regione autonoma italiana Sardegna.
Sardu: Bandera de sa regione autònoma de sa Sardinna.
Date
9 August 2012
Source
Own work using: [1] & [2]
Author
Angelus
Permission
(Reusing this file)

SVG development
InfoField
The SVG code is valid.
This flag was created with Inkscape.
It is easy to put a border around this flag image:
[[File:Flag of Sardinia, Italy.svg|border|96x176px]]
Captions
English
Flag of Sardinia
French
Drapeau de Sardaine
Italian
la bandiera sarda con i quattro Mori
